t: I Added Stained Glass Privacy Film to My Front Door, and Now My Entryway Looks Magical
s: This Lemon Cloud window privacy film from Amazon cost just $27 and completely changed the look of my entryway. While it blocks the view enough to feel protected from someone looking in your house, it still lets light in. It’s easy and quick to install and made my windows look like stained glass.
